710963f-b.title: Manhattan: 6th Street (East) - Avenue D
710963f-b.text:
(1)
805 East 6th Street, north side, between Avenue D and Lewis
Street, showing an as yet unsurpassed method of evading the
summer heat.
June 10, 1933.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same.
1932.
J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.
Negative No. 104.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE ON ALL REPRODUCTIONS.
